Title: Relates to biodegradable, degradable, and decomposable plastics
Summary: Establishes standards for biodegradable, degradable, and decomposable plastics.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 30 §§27-3001 - 27-3011, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to biodegradable, degradable, and decomposable plastics
